name: vscode-deno-tools
description: This is for someone who only wants to use deno tools(such as formatter).

denoTools.enable.description: Enable or disable deno tools, if this is unchecked, all commands will be disabled.

denoTools.format.enableForJavaScript.description: Enable or disable the formatter for JavaScript.

denoTools.format.enableForTypeScript.description: Enable or disable the formatter for TypeScript.

denoTools.format.enableForJavaScriptReac.description: Enable or disable the formatter for JavaScript React.

denoTools.format.enableForTypeScriptReac.description: Enable or disable the formatter for TypeScript React.

denoTools.format.enableForMarkdown.description: Enable or disable the formatter for Markdown.

denoTools.format.enableForJSON.description: Enable or disable the formatter for JSON.

denoTools.format.enableForJSONC.description: Enable or disable the formatter for JSONC.

denoTools.format.config.useTabs.description: Whether to use tabs instead of spaces for indentation.

denoTools.format.config.indentWidth.description: The number of spaces per indentation-level.

denoTools.format.config.singleQuote.description: Whether to use single quotes instead of double quotes.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
